titles.title: Supporting Jobs through Evidence and Innovation Act
Supporting Jobs through Evidence and Innovation Act
To reauthorize workforce development innovation grants for the implementation, expansion, and evaluation of evidence-based workforce programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Supporting Jobs through Evidence and Innovation Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Labor to award competitive workforce development innovation grants to improve the design and delivery of employment and training services.
